summary: Pokecoin app for Pokemon Go with match-three tile game to earn Pokecoins, find shiny female Pokemon, and handle Google Play payouts
architectural_notes: Integration with Pokemon Go API or data source required
Google Play billing API integration for payouts
Pokemon data filtering system for shiny and gender attributes
Match-three game engine with tile matching mechanics
Game reward system linking tile matches to Pokecoin earnings
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Set of colorful Pokemon tile sprites for the match-three game grid, featuring common Pokemon like Pikachu, Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle, Eevee, and Jigglypuff in a cute illustrated style (pokemon-tiles.dim_512x512.png)
- Special shiny female Pokemon tile sprites with sparkle effects for rare discoveries in the game (shiny-female-tiles.dim_512x512.png)
- Game board background with a subtle Pokemon-themed pattern or texture (game-board-bg.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Pokecoin balance tracking system that allows users to log and view their current Pokecoin balance from Pokemon Go
Implement a shiny female Pokemon tracker where users can log and search for shiny female Pokemon they've encountered or are seeking
Create a payout management system where users can track and manage Google Play payout amounts associated with their Pokecoin earnings
Design a cohesive Pokemon-themed visual interface with vibrant colors, playful typography, and card-based layouts that reflect the Pokemon universe aesthetic while maintaining clean usability
Implement a match-three tile game where users can play by swapping adjacent tiles to create matches of three or more identical Pokemon tiles
Award Pokecoins to users based on their match-three game performance, automatically updating their Pokecoin balance when they complete matches
Integrate shiny female Pokemon discovery into the match-three game, allowing users to encounter and unlock shiny female Pokemon through gameplay
Create a payout calculation system that determines Google Play payout amounts based on Pokecoins earned through the match-three game
Add a new Game tab to the main app navigation that hosts the match-three tile game alongside the existing Pokecoins, Shiny Pokemon, and Payouts tabs

new_feature_requests.summary: Pokecoin tracking and management for Pokemon Go
Find and identify shiny female Pokemon
Match-three tile game to earn Pokecoins
